function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete understanding of the influence of occupant behavior on air change rate.","Impact":"Increase in variability of air change rates leading to uncertainty in estimating indoor air pollutant concentrations.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research and studies to fully understand the influence of occupant behavior on air change rates.","Technologies":"Advanced air quality sensors and monitoring devices to measure air change rates.","People":"Residents, researchers, and policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies, and government bodies."},{"Description":"Uncertainty in estimating indoor air pollutant concentrations due to variability in air change rates.","Impact":"Risk of exposure to high levels of indoor air pollutants and potential health effects on residents.","Mitigation":"Develop and implement ventilation systems and air filtration technologies to maintain indoor air quality.","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, and air purifiers.","People":"Residents, building owners, and environmental health professionals.","Owner":"Construction companies, HVAC companies, and public health organizations."}]}
